topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a87f4f6368720909000f43#post_55a87f4f6368720909000f43
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]And then there's all the professional wrestling  I used to watch.

And professional wrestling is just a cheesy soap opera with more violence.[/bq]
If you ask me wrestling is better than actual boxing, cause if we're talking about a important fight with lots and lots of money boxers and that will play it safe rather than actually put on a show; sure wrestling is fake but it's more entertaining.



In another note: I called it that monster musume was going to be the next big thing.  Right now the popularity took off like a rocket.  Before the anime started it was already popular, but now that it has a anime it just in a week shot through the roof.

Even if you don't like harem anime I would still suggest watching it cause the fanservice in the show is used for comedic effect rather than how a lot of anime the fanservice is creepily placed.  If you hate harems the anime is still pretty good; if you hate fanservice the anime is still pretty good.

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a8818763687208c1000279#post_55a8818763687208c1000279
Hey, you know how most martial arts start with unarmed and then move on to weapons.

Arnis is the opposite of that. It starts of with the weapons and ends with bare hands. The concept is the better fighter you are, the less tools you need.
